results.title: Taffy's imagination: fear of the dark
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Forest town fables”.
One of a series of six Forest Town Fables, this film presents realistic explanations of imagined fantasies, so that darkness can be faced with confidence. It explains that Taffy is afraid of the dark until her puppet friends teach her their night game. It also shows how she discovers that things she saw and heard were imagined. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.

results.title: TAFE: many different things
results.brief_description: To inform viewers in rural areas that TAFE is providing a real alternative to conventional schooling. Looks at five people of varying ages from student to housewife, and having two things in common - a rural association and involvement in TAFE courses.

results.title: Tad the frog
results.brief_description: Follows the development of a frog through the egg, tadpole, and adult stages. Shows the eating habits of frogs; how they breathe, grow, and live. Instills ideas on pet care and conservation of wildlife.

results.title: Tacoma Narrows Bridge collapse
results.brief_description: The original Tacoma Narrows Bridge was opened to traffic on the 1st of July 1940, after two years of construction. It collapsed four months later during a 42 mile per hour wind storm. This short film captures the bridge on the day of its collapse showing the start of resonance vibration and the nodal line on the surface of the roadway. It records a driver abandoning his vehicle as he attempts to crawls to safety while the bridge undulates beneath him. It finally show the tearing and collapse of the bridge. The film has a very short segment at the start depicting workers during the constructing stage and an official vehicle crossing the bridge during the opening ceremony.

results.title: Table looms
results.creator_credit: John Gray, Ken J. Widdowson and Educational Media Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Weaving”
An instructional film on weaving for both beginners and more advanced weavers. Shows samples of cloth which can be made on multi-shaft looms such as the table loom.

results.title: T.V. commercials: Mobil circle of safety
results.creator_credit: George Patterson Creative Group and Mobil Oil Australia
results.brief_description: A series of television commercials made with the aim of promoting road safety and advertising the mechanical safety services available from the Mobil service stations. The nine commercials include: Swinging tyres, Traffic trauma, Eye, Cannonball, Queue, Go back, Cosmos, Belt up and Playground. Intellegent copy and strong images reinforce the message as well as the oil company’s logo.
